text:
Emily Blunt as new Mary Poppins

Emily Blunt is likely to be the next Mary Poppins in an upcoming big-screen sequel to the classic 1964 Disney film.

The English actor, known for her roles in Into the Woods and The Devil Wears Prada , recently met with Disney studio bosses to discuss the role, reports news.com.au.

It’s reported the deal is yet to be signed due to scheduling issues, which could be due to the star’s recent news that she’s expecting her second child with her actor husband John Krasinski. The original Mary Poppins film starred Julie Andrews as Poppins and Dick Van Dyke as happy-go-lucky chimney sweep Bert.

The new film, to be produced by John DeLuca and Marc Platt, will take place in London, 20 years after the first film and will focus on the nanny’s continued adventures with the Banks family. — ANI
title: Is Emily Blunt is the next Marry Poppins?
